alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 06 at 1:45PM AKST until March 06 at 10:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions occurring. Additional snow accumulations up to 1 inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze expected. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions are slow to improve so far but should later this evening.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
